data.text: @bouldercohealth Can we give that to people who did the right thing from the beginning? Why are you rewarding bad behavior?
@bouldercohealth Back to #bribery is it…ABSOLUTELY despicable! Especially FOR ANYONE UNDER THE AGE OF 65. God damn you’re #horrible.
@bouldercohealth Wow you are bribing people!   That can’t be good.  Wait and see what Pfizer has to release today.  Data isn’t looking good.
